snippet.title: Surgeon Simulator In Real Life (Live Action VR)
snippet.description:
More info: http://www.surgeonsim.com/

Do YOU want to experience reality, the reality of Mr Nigel Burke, the would-be surgeon taking passive patient Bob’s life into his own shaky hands? Do you love all of those new-fangled futuristic virtual reality VR devices? Then we may have just the thing for you...

Surgeon Simulator: Experience Reality transports you into some of the most unlikely and unsanitary surgeries possible, where you can perform all of your favourite procedures from the critically acclaimed original game . . . now with your OWN TWO HANDS! This is one surgical experience you won’t forget!

Come and chat to us on Twitter. We don’t promise to be nice, but we promise to be friendly - https://twitter.com/surgeonsim
